ValidationRule.description: Validation of Contact Fields on Account
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISBLANK(Account.Contact_Email__c), ISBLANK( Account.Contact_Last_Name__c ), ISBLANK( Account.txtContactsSalutation__c )), ISCHANGED( StageName ), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Contract received") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill out Contact Fields on Account
